definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The letters will be published in the summer of 2010.

sentences.english: This paper takes "Chi Chun Correspondence Collection" as the main research scope.
sentences.chinese: 本论文便是以《琦君书信集》为主要研究范围。

sentences.english: Reading the book will help us to study and understand the…
sentences.chinese: 对这部书信集的研究，是全面了解奈保尔的必要起点。
